title: Premium Hollywood Sound Design - Ultimate Pulses Collection
description: NEW! The definitive toolkit collection of premium Hollywood sound design pulses. Containing a huge 271 track collection of atmospheric pulses and effects.
longDescription:
The definitive toolkit collection of premium Hollywood sound design pulses. Containing a huge 271 track collection of atmospheric pulses and effects; including pulse basses, aggressive pulse stabs, eerie pianos, sirens and heartbeats to bring your game to the next level. To stream/audition the collection please visit HERE!


Available directly from the studios of West One Music Group. Premium, high impact Hollywood sound design tools now available to game developers for the first time.


West One Music Group is a world-renowned creator of music and sound design specifically created for video games, movie trailers, TV shows & advertising. They partner with the world’s biggest media brands with credits including the superhero franchises Guardians of the Galaxy, Avengers and Deadpool.


West One Music Group offers:

*Custom Music Scoring - one track or entire project

*Full Catalog Access - over 60k tracks

*Music Curation - searches & project supervision

*Global & All Gaming Platform Music Licenses

For access to the entire audio catalog and service get in touch with the global team at hi@westonemusic.com / westonemusic.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Huge collection of cinematic sound design
  •  Atmospheric pulses and effects
  •  Pulse basses, aggressive pulse stabs, eerie pianos, sirens and heartbeats


Number of Audio Waves: 271

Number of Audio Cues: 271

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Audio can be reviewed HERE
